snippet: THE SUFFERERS BY THE EXPLOSION OF THE JAMES JACKSON.--Mr. J. R. Smith of this city returned last night from Shawneetown; and we obtain from him some particulars in regard to those wounded by the explosion of the James Jackson. Mr. Smith left there...
lead_paragraph: THE SUFFERERS BY THE EXPLOSION OF THE JAMES JACKSON.--Mr. J. R. Smith of this city returned last night from Shawneetown; and we obtain from him some particulars in regard to those wounded by the explosion of the James Jackson. Mr. Smith left there on Friday, having in charge the body of Dr. Hood, of Deccreek, Mississippi, killed by the explosion.
